Package io.github.noeppi_noeppi.libx.mod.registration

Interface RegistryTransformer

public interface RegistryTransformer
A registry transformer is used by the LibX registration system to register additional things dynamically based on other objects, that have been passed to the system. For more information see ModXRegistration.initRegistration(RegistrationBuilder)
See Also:
  • ModXRegistration.initRegistration(RegistrationBuilder)

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    Object
    getAdditional(net.minecraft.resources.ResourceLocation id, Object object)
    Gets an object that should be passed to the system in addition to the given object.

  • Method Details

    • getAdditional

      @Nullable Object getAdditional(net.minecraft.resources.ResourceLocation id, Object object)
      Gets an object that should be passed to the system in addition to the given object. This method will et called for that Registerable and all things it registers again, so be careful to not create infinite loops. IMPORTANT: The transformers created by LibX may also consume the original object so you might not always get everything you registered here. However this feature is not available for custom transformers. The new object is registered with the same id as the old one. If this is not wanted, wrap it into a Registerable via Registerable.getNamedAdditionalRegisters(ResourceLocation).
